response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you, which I believe would significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and quality, we are confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its true worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering this exclusive opportunity to you at a special price of $11,000. This represents a significant saving compared to its market value, making it an attractive proposition for someone as discerning as yourself. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to serve you with our top-tier solution.", "product_price": 11000}
